RelatedSentence: Issues that may be addressed include whether the problems with the 787 Dreamliner have been resolved , whether the company is building too many planes if the slowdown in Asian 's economy puts a dent in demand , and what the future of its military business will be as its fighter - jet factory in St. Louis is threatened with closure , the Wall Street Journal reports .

Issues that may be addressed include whether the problems with the 787 Dreamliner have been resolved , whether the company is building too many planes if the slowdown in Asian 's economy puts a dent in demand , and what the future of its military business will be as its fighter - jet factory in St. Louis is threatened with closure , the Wall Street Journal reports .

Issues that may be addressed include whether the problems with the 787 Dreamliner have been resolved , whether the company is building too many planes if the slowdown in Asian 's economy puts a dent in demand , and what the future of its military business will be as its fighter - jet factory in St. Louis is threatened with closure , the Wall Street Journal reports .
The event will put Dennis Muilenburg , Boeing 's heir apparent , in the spotlight .
Muilenburg , who formerly headed the company 's Hazelwood - based defense and space unit , was appointed vice chairman , president and chief operating officer in December .

While McNerney has said he has no plans to retire soon , at 64 , he is months away from the company 's mandatory retirement age for executives , and the appointment of Muilenburg has been the company 's clearest public signal of its succession planning , the Wall Street Journal reports .
